conversations.body_text: Hi Rab Lorand,    I'm sorry to inform you  â€‹Our German warehouse has informed us that DHL is still investigating the matter, and a shipment destined for Romania has been held up. We will urge them to provide updates promptly or arrange for a replacement shipment.
